BugInstance.message: Instance-getter method of class using singleton design pattern (org.apache.shardingsphere.test.env.EnvironmentContext) is not synchronized.
Found reliance on default encoding in org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.TestParameterLoader.loadContent(URI): new java.io.InputStreamReader(InputStream)
Found reliance on default encoding in org.apache.shardingsphere.test.loader.strategy.impl.GitHubTestParameterLoadStrategy.loadContent(URI): new java.io.InputStreamReader(InputStream)
